pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, February 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, February 2, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. - The Prime Minister will attend a Cabinet meeting.

Notes for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.


2:00 p.m. - The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. - The Prime Minister will meet with Yukon Premier Darrell Pasloski.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
